== Summary of 2007.Feb.13 Meeting ==

We had a great second meeting.  Here are the results.

* Matthew accepted taking on the task of revising and rewording the Forum Guidelines.
* The Forum Guidelines are know known as the Forum Code of Conduct.
* The ForumAmbassadors project to be officially recognized by the ForumCouncil. The ForumAmbassadors will choose a new name, and be given a sub forum to support their work with developers.
* The Backyard will be kept as an off topic forum.  The rules will change slightly and the wording revised to reflect the forum as being a moderated forum.  
* Forum Team Leaders were selected, congratulations to the following:
